name: Knigget
description:
Loose Jawe's first game for the Pico-8 console. Glorious 16 color palette. ultra-small sprites, treasure and bugs (in code that is, since it is under development) and mobs.

Find crap, don't die, as you steer Knigget through the dungeons if the Pixler. Who knows what horrors await? Or what sort of crashes.

This game is being developed as we learn the pico8 console, so this is a super work in progress, and from time to time, we will upload a new build.

Currently it is in super alpha state, but you can move around at least.
